attributes.action: To create an online poll which government can’t use in Parliament against the PM
attributes.additional_details:
As you may be aware the country is facing a political nightmare at the minute, I believe my solution could solve this. By following the simple steps in the petition we could see the numbers for the 2nd Referendum but it won’t be official so Parliament couldn’t do anything with it. Except it would show an indication of the number to be able to give Boris Johnson the opportunity of what to do at this difficult time. Like me who supports Leave it would show Boris if this would be a good idea or not, however it would show how many voters vote leave or remain giving him the opportunity to discuss this in Parliament and whether to go ahead with one or not and also to shut Jeremy Corbyn, Lib Dem’s and SNP up.
Thank You 

Member of the Conservative and Unionist Party
